title: review: tests fail on windows
body:
from http://build.golang.org/log/32fbb7263970e5b3ef072faf346231a7dcbe25c6

````
--- FAIL: TestCurrentBranch (0.09s)
	util_test.go:122: in git-origin/, ran [git commit -m on master]: exit status 128
		
		*** Please tell me who you are.
		
		Run
		
		  git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
		  git config --global user.name "Your Name"
		
		to set your account's default identity.
		Omit --global to set the identity only in this repository.
		
		fatal: unable to auto-detect email address (got 'wingopher@windows-manual.(none)')
--- FAIL: TestLocalBranches (0.35s)
	util_test.go:122: in git-origin/, ran [git commit -m on master]: exit status 128
		
		*** Please tell me who you are.
		
		Run
		
		  git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
		  git config --global user.name "Your Name"
		
		to set your account's default identity.
		Omit --global to set the identity only in this repository.
		
		fatal: unable to auto-detect email address (got 'wingopher@windows-manual.(none)')
```

I am not git expert. What would be simplest way to please git here? Thank you.

Alex
